hotBeveragesItems.name: Cappuccino
hotBeveragesItems.description: Cappuccino is an espresso-based coffee drink that is traditionally prepared with steamed milk including a layer of milk foam.

hotBeveragesItems.name: Latte
hotBeveragesItems.description: Caffè latte, often shortened to just latte in English.

hotBeveragesItems.name: Nescafe
hotBeveragesItems.description: Nescafé is a brand with instant coffee made by the Vevey-based company Nestlé.

hotBeveragesItems.name: Lipton Tea
hotBeveragesItems.description: Drink Positive with Lipton® tea products and discover the tasty and refreshing drinks from the world's leading tea brand.
